reviewText: I have been using this dvd for 6 months, every student can relate. Speaker is down to earth, educational and describes anger personalities easy to understand. More techniques on how to, would be useful.

I showed this dvd  at the request of several of my employees. It was wonderful. Easy to understand and very well done. They are taking it home to show their husbands in a lending library manner. We saw ourselves in many of the scenerios presented and then were able to get tips on our improvement . Worth every penny and then some..
Easy to understand. Numerous ways of approaching the subject to better understand it.
